text: 3.15: 1 Ko 12.13; 12.27; Ef 2.16-17; 4.4; Fi 4.7Krais, ana ndava mɨɨtɨgar nza ndɨɨv, nza mbuim, nza wari tɨgap ndava bavira kim, mba ndava mɨɨtɨk guigira nde ndavi ganɨrim, nde kɨri. Fhe Bakɨme nden kamgim, nde wari tɨgɨp, ndava bavira kɨri. Nde kɨv, zazera Fhe Bakɨmen ndikndigɨp, ana phorgɨ suaŋri.
